intent_template: The person in the video {description}. Can you add {description2} to my cart?
intent: The person in the video mentions they live next to the headquarters of a certain company. Can you add the cheapest item available on the OneStopMarket from that company to my cart?
intermediate_intent: What was the company that the person in the video said they live next to?

instantiation_dict.description: mentions they live next to the headquarters of a certain company
instantiation_dict.description2: the cheapest item available on the OneStopMarket from that company

must_include: Apple iMac MF885LL/A 27-Inch 5K Retina Display (3.3 Ghz Quad-core processor, 1TB Hard Drive, 8GB DDR3L) (Renewed)
